name: Add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from a new affiliate in Tapfiliate
description:
Every time a new affiliate is added to Tapfiliate, a new row will be inserted to a Google Sheet spreadsheet.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t09y0smGpAEJxtbZqOGgtSsGAJNrKtFvofdpYnBHpos/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as a destination for the Tapfiliate data. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
